feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: SW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. A few local snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
